mapper.select: SELECT t.test_title testTitle , t.createdate createdate , q.question_idx questionIdx , q.question_title questionTitle , q.question_score questionScore , e.example_idx exampleIdx , e.example_title exampleTitle , e.answer exampleAnswer , p.answer paperAnswer , p.answer_ox answerOx FROM test t INNER JOIN question q ON t.test_no = q.test_no INNER JOIN example e ON q.question_no = e.question_no INNER JOIN paper p ON e.question_no = p.question_no WHERE p.paper_no = #{paperNo} AND p.student_no = #{studentNo}
